thought: To craft blue_glazed_terracotta, I first need to craft blue_dye and blue_terracotta. To craft blue_dye, I need to place a cornflower in the crafting grid. The cornflower is in slot 13, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1
